text: Anita Lindman (née Lamm; 14 May 1932 - 31 August 2018) was a Swedish television announcer and producer. She was known for the children's program Anita och Televinken, which she both produced and announced for. She was a daughter of Uno Lamm and Ingalill Beckman. Lindman died in Norrtälje on 31 August 2018, aged 86. ==References== ==Other websites== *Anita Lindman at Swedish Film Database *Anita Lindman at LIBRIS *Anita Lindman at Svensk mediedatabas Category:1932 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Television producers Category:Swedish television presenters
title: Anita Lindman
